Key Match Events: Francisco Lindor hit a go-ahead grand slam in the sixth inning
Post-Match Reflections: Francisco Lindor expressed his desire to win it all
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Mets will face either the Padres or Dodgers beginning Sunday in Game 1 of the NLCS
Others: The Mets needed a victory on the final day of the regular season just to reach the playoffs
The Phillies were the NL East champions, but that designation got them exactly one playoff victory
